channel.title: Battlefield 3 Graphics problem
channel.description:
I've been having this issue while playing the BF3 beta: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4iOHiu6S_Pg[/url]
It only happens on Caspian Border, Operation Metro works just fine.
Specs: i5 2500 MSI GTX 560 ti twin frozr
I've tried with the stable and the beta drivers. The glitch/bug is present with both of them. BF3 is only game that has given me this (or any) kind of trouble.
Could this be a problem of the drivers having problems with a factory overclocked card? Should I get an RMA or just wait for the final stable release?

item.title: Battlefield 3 Graphics problem
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Wait for the final release of both the game and drivers. If the problem persists, contact the card manufacturer then.

item.title: Battlefield 3 Graphics problem

item.description:
I’ve been having this issue while playing the BF3 beta:

It only happens on Caspian Border, Operation Metro works just fine.

Specs:
i5 2500
MSI GTX 560 ti twin frozr

I’ve tried with the stable and the beta drivers. The glitch/bug is present with both of them. BF3 is only game that has given me this (or any) kind of trouble.

Could this be a problem of the drivers having problems with a factory overclocked card? Should I get an RMA or just wait for the final stable release?
